modName: Warehouse for the house - addition by Ashenfire
summary:
Common resources in one place to copy and paste into your mod.
Read change log for more descriptions
descriptionHtml:
This project is shut down, due mostly to not being able to collaborate with Hellcat5 in
a timely manner. He started the mod.

I have created a new project: WareHouseContainersAsh
So if you want drag and drop containers that I create, you will have to go the the
WareHouseContainersAsh Project for updates.




The original author hellcat5 gave us a great break.


I am just adding on to his room for MODDERS.
Fixed potions and scripts to be predictable now.

You can copy and paste the hard to create items. Mannequins, dagger rack display with activators, weapon racks, bookshelves, interior walls and droppable items.

Drag and drop potions and the triggers for them, then link ref the 'orange' container
to the orange dummy potions on the display. Scripts included.
Must make own keywords and forms to match the scripts.
IT WORKS when you coc to the cell. It won't work if you only drag and drop.
Look for future version, trying to make them droppable.

You can drag and drop an actor and the 2 woodpiles it is linked to. The actor will carry
firewood. You must use the AI PACKAGE I created or look at my AI package and create the same
one in your active file. There is a book next to the actor that explains how to make it work.


coc warehousehome if you want to take a look, but it is meant for the creation kit.
author: Ashenfire and hellcat5

files.name: Warehouse for the house - addition by Ashenfire
files.fileName: Warehouse for the house - addition by Ashenfire-22551-1-4.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Farmer carries wood. Booklet next to wood to explain how to get it to work.
Potion rack - Display case large and flat. Holds 50 potions and actually displays them.
Potion rack - Display case large and angled off ground. Holds 50 potions and actually displays them.
Potion rack - Dwemer small rack holds 15 potions, 5 per shelf. Potion rack - Dwemer large shelf holds 14 per shelf
Potion shelf-holds 15 potions for display. Revamped book shelves for more variety and functionality.
File name ending with 1_4 is the latest file.
Fixed weapon and shield rack.
Added How To Document to make the potions work. They are only items that are not drag&drop ready.
